text: PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY:
6 years of professional experience as a motivated .Net/ UI developer, working under pressure and deadlines to accomplish project objectives.
Able to analyze business requirements and formulate a design in both individual and team scenarios.
Experience in interacting with Clients and Users for gathering requirements.
Extensive design experience with web technologies HTML/HTML5, CSS/CSS3, Bootstrap, JavaScript, jQuery, Angular JS.

Strong experience in design of web-based applications using ASP.NET 4.5/4.0/3.5/2.0, C# 4.5/4.0/3.0/2.0, AJAX, Master Pages, Web Services, Windows services and Server Controls. Incorporated many rich, user friendly, responsive features in the application using Angular JS, BOOTSTRAP, and HTML5.
Experience hosting web applications in IIS, developing applications using the ASP.NET MVC.
Worked on C# and ADO.net for developing windows applications as well as developing the web applications using Language Integrated Query (LINQ).
Proficiency in multiple databases like MySQL, ORACLE and MS SQL Server.
Ability to learn new frameworks, design patterns quickly and adapt.
Experience in working with both Agile (Scrum Framework) and Waterfall Methodologies.
Hands on experience in C#.Net, Visual Studio.Net, ASP.NET, MVC, ADO.net, Web services, RESTAPI, SOAP, XML, WCF and Web API.
Experience with Azure to developing and deploying web applications in Cloud Environment
Designed CSS for different browsers and worked on UML diagrams.
Proficient in writing Complex Database Queries, Creating Tables, views, Stored Procedures, Functions and Triggers.
Good experience working in Bootstrap UI, Silverlight, and HTML 5.
Developed internet/intranet applications using Xml Web Services and WCF (Windows Communication Foundation).
Experience with Test Driven Development (TDD)
Experienced in deploying and testing web applications on IIS 7.0/6.0.
Experience in securing web applications using ASP.NET authentication and authorization mechanisms
Involved in leading many daily SCRUM meetings which establishes the context of daily goals of work.
Strong team builder having excellent analytical skills with capability to handle new technologies.
Solid skills for Management such as Communication & Time with good team skills for improving the intention to work in fast paced environment.
TECHNICAL SKILLS:
ACADEMIC PROFILE
Springfield, IL                     University of Illinois at Springfield                 May 2017
Master’s in Computer Science	                                                         GPA: 3.8
WORK  EXPERIENCE:
CSG International, Chicago
Software Engineer                              						 April 2018 – Till Date
Responsibilities:

Working on developing a C# .Net project, Ascendon and its solutions which supply backend billing capabilities for digital-media and IoT based solutions (i.e. Redbox, Disney, Formula One, Dish, AT&T etc.)
Implemented and extensively used the Object-Oriented programming concepts in C#
Working as a Developer within a cross functional agile team to develop new components within an environment using .NET, SQL Server, Elastic Search, Angular, Redux
Using Microsoft SQL Server Profiler, Kibana, JMeter to performance tune and monitor slow running queries and processes.
Implemented and consumed Web Services using WCF.
Developed User Interactive Web pages using HTML5, CSS3 validations using JavaScript, Angular.js.
Developed Web API's to receive and send JSON messages and web services using WCF.
Used Bootstrap styles extensively to get the right styling for the Web Pages
Worked with JIRA, Confluence to resolve defects and implement enhancements
Working with SQL Server and Elastic search to persist and cache data
Working on implementing feature requests for Ascendon in C# and to resolve defects
Developing automation scripts to optimize various processes involved throughout the project lifecycle.
Wrote NUnit Unit Tests and Spec flow/Gherkin tests to cover unit testing prior to deployment.
Perform automated tests, unit tests (NUNIT) and customized load testing for the overall system and the custom API specifically using tools such as JMeter etc.

Communicate effectively with the scrum master, product owners and business stakeholders/end clients and fellow team members to facilitate understanding of deliverables, prioritization, and required effort.
Environment: .Net Framework 4.7/4.5/4.0, Visual Studio 2017, C#, SQL Server 2016, AJAX, JavaScript, Confluence 2018, NUnit, IIS, LINQ, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Kibana, Bootstrap, Bamboo, GitHub.
Credit Suisse, Raleigh, NC
Software Developer   	            							June 2016 - March 2018
Responsibilities:
I was involved in the complete software development life cycle (SDLC) and developed User Interfaces using ASP.NET MVC and C#.NET.
Coordinate with business users in gathering business requirements, designing and programming the application according to the requirements and translating them to technical specifications
Demonstrate a good understanding of object oriented design patterns, principles and frameworks used for web application development.
HTML, JavaScript, jQuery, CSS3 for front-end development.
Integrated this application with a WCF service layer and Entity framework to enable transfer of data between the client and server.
Designed and developed Stored Procedures, Tables, Indexes, Triggers and Views, used SQL Server as the database.
Involved in implementation of Object-Oriented Concepts during the development.
Extensively used ADO.NET objects such as Data Adapter, Data Reader, Dataset and Data View for reading/updating records in the database.
Involved in writing complex SQL Statements, Views and Stored Procedures, Indexes to validate data and ensure system integrity and security Written LINQ functions for data access.
Participated in Unit testing of the application and wrote the test cases to test each of the application modules with the help of Nunit.
Worked with the QA team on a daily basis in fixing the reported bugs/defects.
Participated in various Client meetings with the team and the project manager to discuss improvements in the development of the application.
Involved in Scrum methodology and involved in daily sprint meetings.
Environment: Visual Studio 2015, C#, SQL Server 2016, AJAX, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuery Bootstrap, Kibana, Bitbucket, Bamboo, SourceTree, Git, VMware.
Liquid Hub, India
Software Developer                          	     					    Jan 2015 - Dec 2015

Worked as developer in the team for design and development of application using Microsoft Visual studio with the ASP.Net 3.0, SQL Server 2008.
The coding of the application was in C#/ASP.NET using an N-tiered architecture consisting of the presentation layer, data access layer and the database layer.

Used Entity Framework and LINQ to Entities Connect to the Database and perform all the database transactions
Extensively used java script for client-side validations

Used WPF of .NET for creating control templates and more appealing visual appearance.
Involved in writing SQL statements and stored procedures.
Implemented Web API Services for CRUD operations with HTTP verbs GET, POST, PUT and DELETE.
Used ADO.Net for creating and manipulating data access logic.
Performed Unit Testing with the testing tool NUnit and involved in Unit test case, code review checklist preparation and validation.
Developed Agile Software Development methodologies to enable efficient and effective high-quality software development.
Provided maintenance and Production support to clients by fixing the issues.
Written and improved application technical documentation and provided knowledge transfer to team members.
Environment: Visual Studio 2010, ASP.Net 4.0, C#, SQL Server 2008, Ado.net, AJAX, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Json.

Jr. Software Developer                  	      					       Jan 2013 - Dec 2014

Developed the portal pages in ASP.Net using Master Page, Themes & skins to maintain the consistent look and feel throughout the application
Customize the software according to client specifications by implementing new Custom Controls, using C#, WPF and MVC.
Used WCF for inter communication between the applications using MSMQ for providing secure, reliable transport messaging queue.
Developed Web API's to receive and send JSON messages and web services using WCF.
Produced content pages with CSS layout and style markup presentations and used JavaScript methods and properties
Designed and implemented Data Grid Web Parts to display data from SQL Server 2008 database utilizing Business Data Catalog features.
Developed the Unit Test plans, created the scripts and executed Test cases using WinRunner.
